mapper.insert: INSERT INTO appointment (userid, time, parkingid, certificate, state, create_time) VALUES (#{userid}, #{time}, #{parkingid}, #{certificate}, #{state}, #{create_time})
mapper.update: UPDATE parking SET available = available-1 WHERE #{parkingid} = id AND available > 0
UPDATE parking SET available = available+1 WHERE #{parkingid} = id AND available > 0
mapper.select: SELECT appointment.id AS id, appointment.userid AS userid, appointment.parkingid as parkingid, appointment.time AS time, certificate AS certificate, appointment.end_time AS end_time, start_time AS start_time, create_time AS create_time, appointment.state AS state, money AS money, parking.name AS name, parking.image AS image FROM appointment, parking WHERE appointment.parkingid = parking.id AND appointment.userid = #{userid}
